item.description:
This event open to all kayak types as well as canoes

Location: Newfound Lake, Wellington State Park, Bristol, NH The put-in will be at Wellington State Park public boat launch in Bristol NH.

Click on picture above for view of Boat Ramp

There is a public boat launch next to the park but you use the same entrance road to get to it. When you come to the park entrance tell them you are using the public boat launch only if you don't plan to use the park then you can save the cost of the park fee. The canoe/kayak launch is to the right side of the power boat launch ramp.

Wellington State Park Web Site

Activities: Swimming, picnicking, fishing,
Bathhouse, picnic tables, boat launch

Admission to the park is $4 for adults; NH residents age 65 and over are admitted free

Directions:
* Take Rt. 93 North to exit 23 for RT-132 S/RT-104 West toward New Hampton
* Turn left onto RT-104/RT-132 Continue to follow RT-104 for 5.9 miles
* Turn right onto RT-3A Lake Street at 2.1 miles Turn left at W Shore Rd.
* Stay on West Shore Rd. to Wellington Beach State Park 3.1 miles.

Google Maps directions to Wellington State Park Boat Launch Bristol NH
item.how_to_find_us: The put-in will be at Wellington State Park
item.name: Newfound Lake Paddle from Wellington State Park
